meanings.definition: A plant native to tropical Africa, used as a vermifuge.
meanings.sent1: The kousso plant is known for its ability to expel worms from the body.
meanings.sent2: People in Africa have been using kousso for generations to treat worm infections.
meanings.sent3: The kousso plant said to worms, 'You are not welcome here!'
meanings.sent4: Her determination to fight off the worms was as strong as the kousso plant's effect.
meanings.sent5: The image of the kousso plant battling worms stuck in his mind.

meanings.definition: The dried flowers of the kousso plant, used as a remedy for tapeworms.
meanings.sent1: She brewed a tea with kousso to rid herself of tapeworms.
meanings.sent2: The kousso flowers have a potent effect on tapeworms when consumed.
meanings.sent3: The tapeworms were surprised by the sudden kousso attack.
meanings.sent4: The kousso flowers worked like warriors fighting against the tapeworm invasion.
meanings.sent5: The smell of kousso flowers filled the room, promising relief from tapeworms.
